dict.acceptation: 使无能力( disable的过去式和过去分词)；使残废；使伤残；使无效；

sent.orig: HowPara-olympics (Paralympics) could change views of the disabled (disabled) in China.
sent.trans: 残奥会将如何改变中国残疾人的看法呢？

sent.orig: All child columns in a disabled nested column must be disabled.
sent.trans: 禁用的嵌套列中的所有子列都必须是禁用的。

sent.orig: As a part of the cause for the disabled, disabled sports began to grow.
sent.trans: 作为残疾人事业的一部分，残疾人体育事业开始萌芽。

sent.orig: Disabled adults attend during one month. Disabled children attend during another month.
sent.trans: 残疾的成年人在此度假一个月，残疾儿童则度假另一个月。

sent.orig: Ordinary pre-school education institutions should be able to adapt their lives to receive the disabled child.
sent.trans: 普通幼儿教育机构应当接收能适应其生活的残疾幼儿。
